name: motion.md
description: `motion.md` is a powerful npm package and CLI tool designed for creating dynamic, high-quality videos using Markdown syntax. Fully compatible with [Slidev](https://sli.dev) syntax, `motion.md` extends the syntax to include advanced configuration options in both the front matter and at the slide level, leveraging [Remotion](https://remotion.dev) to transform your slides into stunning videos. This makes `motion.md` ideal for presentations, tutorials, and content creation.
